description.raw:
It's been [failing in Jenkins](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64/1123/testReport/junit/%28root%29/REGRESSION_940_force_torque_sensor_frame/test_ran/) since [sdformat pull request 98](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-request/98/add-new-tag-measure_direction-to) hasn't been released yet.
~~~
219: [ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/Issue940Test.ForceTorqueSensorFrameTest/0
219: [Msg] Waiting for master.
219: [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
219: [Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.1.19
219: [Err] [RenderEngine.cc:665] Can't open display: 
219: [Wrn] [RenderEngine.cc:88] Unable to create X window. Rendering will be disabled
219: Error [parser.cc:702] XML Element[measure_direction], child of element[force_torque] not defined in SDF. Ignoring.[force_torque]
219: Error [parser.cc:693] Error reading element <force_torque>
219: Error [parser.cc:693] Error reading element <sensor>
219: Error [parser.cc:693] Error reading element <joint>
219: Error [parser.cc:693] Error reading element <model>
219: Error [parser.cc:693] Error reading element <world>
219: Error [parser.cc:353] Unable to read element <sdf>
219: Error [parser_urdf.cc:2635] Unable to call parseURDF on robot model
219: Error [parser.cc:278] parse as old deprecated model file failed.
219: [Err] [Server.cc:299] Unable to read sdf file[worlds/force_torque_frame_test.world]
219: [Err] [PhysicsIface.cc:61] no worlds
219: [Err] [PhysicsIface.cc:75] Unable to find world by name in physics::get_world[]
219: [Err] [Exception.cc:52] EXCEPTION: Unable to find world by name in physics::get_world(world_name)
219: 
219: terminate called after throwing an instance of 'gazebo::common::Exception'
219: 
 7/20 Test #219: REGRESSION_940_force_torque_sensor_frame ...........***Exception: Other  0.28 sec
~~~
I've made a [pull request to bump the patch number of sdformat](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-request/99/bump-sdformat-patch-number-for-development) on the sdf_2.0 branch, so that using a source build of sdformat will enable this test.

title.raw: Disable REGRESSION_940_force_torque_sensor_frame for sdformat 2.0.0 and earlier
